1305:5: daśeme dharmāḥ saphalasya bodhisattvamārgasya mahāyānasya saṃgrahāya saṃvartante|
1305:7: ādhāro liṅgaṃ pakṣo'dhyāśayo vihāra upapattiḥ parigraho bhūmiścaryā pratiṣṭhā ca|
1305:12: iha bodhisattvasya svagotraṃ prathamaścittotpādaḥ sarve ca bodhipakṣyā dharmā ādhāra ityucyate|
1305:14: iha bodhisattvo gotraṃ niśritya pratiṣṭhāpayitavyo bhavati|
1305:17: iha bodhisattvaḥ prathamacittotpādaṃ niśritya pratiṣṭhāya dāne'pi prayujyate śīle kṣāntau vīryeṃ dhyāne prajñāyāmapi prayujyate iti|
1305:18: yadvā pāramitāsu puṇyasaṃbhāre jñānasaṃbhāre sarveṣu ca bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu prayujyate|
1305:20: iha bodhisattvastameva bodhisattvacaryāprayogaṃ niśritya pratiṣṭhāyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ paripūrayati|
1305:22: agotrastha pudgalo gotre'sati cittotpāde'pi yatnasamāśraye satyabhavyaścānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ paripūraye|
1305:23: tadanena paryāyeṇa veditavyamanutpāditacittasyāpi bodhisattvasya akṛte'pi bodhisattvacaryāprayoge gotramādhāra iti|
1305:24: sa cet punargotrasthaścittaṃ notpādayati bodhicaryāsu na prayujyate na kṣipraṃ bodhimārāgayati tāsvapi viparyayāt kṣipramārāgayatīti veditavyam|
1305:39: tena khalu gotreṇa samanvāgatānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānatikramya prāgevānyān sattvānniruttaro viśeṣo veditavyaḥ|
1305:43: tatra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ tadgotraṃ kleśāvaraṇaviśuddhyā viśudhyati na tu jñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhyā|
1305:44: bodhisattvagotraṃ punarapi kleśāvaraṇaviśuddhyā api jñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhyā viśudhyati|
1305:46: api ca caturbhirākārairbodhisattvasya śrāvakapratyekabuddhebhyo viśeṣo veditavyaḥ|
1305:54: bodhisattvaḥ apyātma hitāya api parahitāya bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇām|
1305:56: śrāvakaḥ pratyekabuddhaśca skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpāda-sthānāsthānasatyakauśalyaṃ karoti bodhisattvastatra cānyeṣu ca sarvavidyāsthāneṣu|
1305:66: satsu ca saṃvidyamāneṣu deyadharmeṣu satatasamitaṃ pareṣāṃ saṃvibhāgaśīlo bhavati pramuditacittaśca dadāti na vimanaskaḥ|
1305:75: pṛṣṭo'pṛṣṭo vā teṣu teṣu sattvakṛtyeṣvanapāyamihaloke paraloke nyāyopadeśamanuprayacchati|
1305:79: ṛṇaṃ gṛhītvā parebhyo na visaṃvādayati nābhidruhyati|
1305:86: udāreṣu ca karmānteṣvadhimukto bhavati na parīttāyadvāreṣu|
1305:92: hrīvyapatrāpyaṃ prāviṣkaroti vipule'pi ca bhogapratilambhe nādhimātralolupo bhavati prāgevālpe|
1305:93: itimānyevaṃ bhāgīyāni bodhisattvasya dānapāramitāyā gotraliṅgāni veditavyāni|
1305:95: iha bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyā mṛdunā kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇā samanvāgato bhavatyakuśalena nātyartharaudreṇa nātyarthasattvopaghātakena|
1305:96: kṛtvāpi ca pāpakaṃ karma laghu ladhveva vipratisāraṃ pratilabhate|
1305:104: upakāriṣu ca sattveṣu kṛtajño bhavati kṛtavedī|
1305:110: parabādhayā cāttyartha bādhyate yaduta pareṣāṃ vadhabandhanacchedanatāḍanakutsanatarjanādikayā dṛṣṭvā vā śrutvā vā|
1305:113: parakṛtyeṣu ca parakaraṇīyeṣu sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchati yaduta kṛṣivaṇijyāgorakṣyarājapauruṣyalipigaṇananyasanasaṃkhyāmudrāyāṃ bhartṛprasādane kulaprasādane rājakulaprasādane mitrāmitraprasādane bhogānāmarjane rakṣaṇe sannidhau prayoge visarge āvāhavivāhābhakṣaṇasaṃbhakṣaṇeṣvevaṃbhāgīyeṣu sattvakṛtyeṣu sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchati|
1305:114: na kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādeṣu ca paraviheṭhanakaraṇīyeṣu ye ātmanaḥ pareṣāñcānarthāyāhitāya duḥkhāya saṃvartante|
1305:118: samānakṣāntiśīlatayā apahāya svakāryaṃ parairātmakārye yathākāmaṃ niyojyate|
1305:119: ārdracittaśca bhavati peśalacitto na ca ciramāghātacittatāṃ pratighacittatāmudvahati nānyatra tatkṣaṇa evāsya taccittaṃ bhadratāyāṃ parivartate|
1305:121: na ca pareṣāṃ mitrabhedaṃ rocayati na karoti|
1305:123: priyaṃvadaśca bhavatyaparakaṭukaḥ api svakasya dāsādiparijanasya prāgeva pareṣām guṇapriyaśca bhavati pareṣāṃ bhūtasya varṇasyāhartā|
1305:126: iha bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyā pareṣāmantikādapakāraṃ labdhvā nāghātacittatāṃ prāviṣkaroti nāpyapakārāya prapadyate|
1305:128: na ca khilaṃ dhārayati na cirakālikaṃ vairāśayaṃ vahati|
1305:132: kālyotthāyī sāyaṃ nipātī na nidrāsukhaṃ śayanasukhaṃ pārśvasukhamatyarthaṃ svīkaroti|
1305:133: pratyupasthite ca kṛtye abhibhūyākartukāmatāmālasyaṃ pratisaṃkhyāya prayujyate tasya kṛtyasyābhiniṣpattaye|
1305:134: sarvakṛtyasamārambheṣu ca dṛḍhaniścayo bhavati nākṛtvā nāpariprāpya sarveṇa sarvaṃ vīryasraṃsayati antarā vā viṣādamāpadyate|
1305:135: udāreṣu ca parameṣvartheṣu na cetasā saṃkocamāpadyate|
1305:138: vīraśca bhavati mahāsabhāpraveśe vā paraiḥ sahābhiprayoga pratyabhiyoge vā tadanyatra vā duṣkarakarmaṇi mahāvyavasāyeṣvapi cārthopasaṃhiteṣu nātyarthaṃ khedamāpadyate prāgeva parītteṣu|
1305:141: iha bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyā dharmārthopanidhyāne avikṣepabahulo bhavati|
1305:143: ca prāntāni śayanāsanāni manuṣyarahaḥsevitāni vigatapāpakāni pratisaṃlayanasārūpyakāṇi dṛṣṭvā śrutvā sukhaṃ tannaiṣkramyaṃ prāvivekyamiti naiṣkramyaprāvivekye tīvramautsukyamutpādayati|
1305:144: prakṛtyā ca mandakleśo bhavati mandanivaraṇo mandadauṣṭhulyaḥ|
1305:145: pravivekagatasya cāsya svārthaṃ paritulayataḥ pāpakāḥ asadvitarkā nātyarthaṃ cittaṃ kṣobhayanti na paryādāya tiṣṭhanti|
1305:146: [saḥ] amitrapakṣe'pi tvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ maitracittatāmupasthāpayati prāgeva mitrodāsīnapakṣe|
1305:147: vicitraiśca duḥkhairduḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ śrutvā vā dṛṣṭvā vā mahatkāruṇyacittamutpādayati|
1305:148: duḥkhāpanayāya ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ yathāśaktyā yathābalaṃ vyāpāraṃ gacchati|
1305:149: prakṛtyā ca sattveṣu hitakāmo bhavati sukhakāmaḥ|
1305:150: dhṛtimāṃśca bhavatyāpatsu jñātivyasane vā bhogavyasane vā vadhe vā bandhane vā pravāse vā ityevaṃbhāgīyāsvāpatsu|
1305:151: medhāvī ca dharmāṇāṃ grahaṇadhāraṇohanasamarthaḥ smṛtibalena ca samanvāgato bhavati|
1305:155: iha bodhisattvaḥ sarvavidyāsthānajñeyapraveśāya sahajayā prajñayā samanvāgato bhavati|
1305:157: tāsu tāsu ca pramādasthānaviratiṣu pratisaṃkhyānabaliko bhavati|
1305:160: bhūtārthaniścaye tu buddhā eva bhagavantaḥ pratyakṣadarśinaḥ|
1305:161: yasmācca tadgotraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ prakṛtyaiva guṇayuktaṃ bhadraṃ kalyāṇaṃ śukladharmasamanvāgataṃ tasmāttāvad durabhisaṃbhavasya śreṣṭhasyācintyasyācalasyānuttarasya tathāgatasya padasyāvāptaye hetubhāvena yujyate'nyathā na yujyate|
1305:162: tāvacca bodhisattva ebhiḥ śukladharmaiḥ prakṛtyaiva yukto bhavati yāvanna śukladharmavairodhikaiścaturbhirupakleśaiḥ sakalavikalairupakliṣṭo bhavati|
1305:163: yadā copakliṣṭo bhavati sa tadā eṣu ca śukleṣu dharmeṣu na saṃdṛśyate|
1305:165: apāyopapattāvapi bodhisattvasya tadanyebhyaḥ apāyopapannebhyaḥ sattvebhyo gotrakṛto mahān viśeṣo veditavyaḥ|
1305:166: iha bodhisattvo dīrgheṇa kālena kadācit karhicidapāyeṣūpapadyate|
1305:168: na ca tathā tīvrāmāpāyikīṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate tadyathā'nye'pāyopapannāḥ sattvāḥ|
1305:169: tayā ca tanvyā duḥkhayā vedanayā spṛṣṭo'dhimātraṃ saṃvegamutpādayati|
1305:170: teṣu ca sattveṣu tatropapanneṣu duḥkhiteṣu kāruṇyacittaṃ pratilabhate yaduta tenaiva gotreṇa ca sattveṣu tatropapanneṣu duḥkhiteṣu kārūṇyacittaṃ pratilabhate yaduta tenaiva gotreṇa buddhamahākaruṇāhetunā codyamānaḥ|
1305:171: ityevaṃbhāgīyaḥ apāyopapattau bodhisattvasya tadanyebhyaḥ apāyopapannebhyaḥ sattvebhyo viśeṣo veditavyaḥ|
1305:172: tatra katame te bodhisattvasya catvāraḥ śukladharmavairodhikā upakleśāḥ|
1305:173: pūrvaṃ pramattasya kleśābhyāsāttīvrakleśatā āyatakleśatā cāyaṃ prathama upakleśaḥ|
1305:177: caturbhiḥ kāraṇairevaṃ gotrasaṃpanno'pi bodhisattvo na śaknotyanuttara samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum|
1305:179: iha bodhisattvaḥ ādita eva kalyāṇamitraṃ na labhate aviparītabodhimārgadaiśikaṃ buddhaṃ vā bodhisattvaṃ vā|
1305:181: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo labdhvāpi kalyāṇamitraṃ viparītagrāhī viparītaṃ śikṣate bodhisattvaśikṣāsu|
1305:183: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo labdhvāpi kalyāṇamitramaviparītaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvaśikṣāsu tasmin prayoga śithilaprayogo bhavati kusīdo nodagrapratatavīryasamanvāgataḥ|
1305:185: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo labdhvā kalyāṇamitramaviparītaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvaśikṣāsu tasmiṃśca prayoge ārabdhavīryaḥ aparipakvendriyo bhavatyaparipūrṇabodhisaṃbhāraḥ dīrghakālāparijayādvodhipakṣya dharmāṇām|
1305:189: asati tu gotre sarveṇa sarva sarvathā bodharaprāptireva veditavyā|
1305:190: bodhisattvabhūmau ādhāre yogasthāne prathamaṃ gotrapaṭalaṃ samāptam||
